title: BerryGo Women's Embroidery Pearl Button Down Dress V Neck Spaghetti Strap Maxi Dress
description: ❤️Soft and comfortable wear, breath freely, recommend cold hand wash.Please check or size chart before purchasing.Size runs a little bit large, if you are in between sizes we recommend choosing a size down.

🧡We're predicting summer fun and great things to come when you wear our cotton flowy summer dresses! Trimmed with lush embroidery, adjustable spaghetti strap, sexy backless and v neck design, elastic smocked waist in the back, slit front.

💛This beach Casual sundress will guarantee your next kiss underneath the moonlight. Beautiful round pearls button-down front, hollow out waist and dress bottom design, embroidery featured flare wedding guest dress.

💚Gorgeous for beach, party, casual, cocktail, homecoming, prom, dating, travel, holiday, prom,cocktail, concert, wedding, honeymoon, etc.Wear this look with a floppy wide-brimmed hat, sunnies, and your favorite slide sandals for an effortlessly chic beach look!

💙Ladies, beat the heat in a breezy fit that's bound to attract all the onlookers. You'll not regret getting this princessy and fairy dress. The fabric has no stretchy, please order a size up if you want more room.
